website_summaries.verdict: This green coffee bean powder contains active chlorogenic acid, the component of coffee beans that can be lost when roasting, which aids in appetite control and weight loss.
pros: Organic, non-GMO, vegan-friendly, with no additives, preservatives, gluten, or tree nuts
Designed to subtly produce more energy without being jittery
cons: Some users report a laxative effect
Others report a lack of expected energy boost

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I strongly believe it really helped me lose weight. For just 6 weeks, I lost 20 to 25 lbs, from 160 to 165 lbs to just 140 to 145 lbs. I just add it to my freshly brewed coffee (black) in the morning. It speeds up my metabolism. And, it is pure, without any kind of fillers. I want to maintain my 140/145 lbs weight, so, I’ll keep buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Tabliago

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an added boost for energy in my copycat Starbucks Refreshers recipes. I was a bit skeptical about the diet aid this extract is.......but I do find my appetite is decreased when I drink this!
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works well for appetite control. Do not go over board it you will spend a little more time in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Love shopping

customer_reviews.title: Lost 7 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Lost 7 lbs after taking this for 1 month, I'm very happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Ken miller

customer_reviews.title: Super tiny scoop of energy
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't effect the flavor what so ever. I'm hoping this will had a little hop in my step. Trying to ween myself off of coffee for my stomach's sake
customer_reviews.author: F. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Energy Boost
customer_reviews.text: A little bitter tasting but mixes well with tea to provide a noticeable energy boost and clearer head. Really helped with rough days at work!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: More energizing than regular coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried green coffee. It's... interesting. It seems to be more energizing than regular coffee, that's for sure. As far as taste goes, I definitely like the taste of just regular coffee better, but on days that I need some extra energy, this is definitely what I'll be reaching for.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Tsuji

customer_reviews.title: Measure the amount right for you.
customer_reviews.text: When home, I love the convenience of measuring out just the right amount for me and adding it to my green morning drink. I will continue to buy this product for at home use and will buy capsules when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Irena

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Received as listed on time. I mixed it with hibiscus and dried strawberries. It was fantastic and seemed caffeinated enough.
customer_reviews.author: Banno

customer_reviews.title: So much caffeine I can see sounds
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to say other than this stuff keeps you awake and the flavor isn’t too strong. Don’t use more than like half a teaspoon in a 24oz glass because when it says maximum strength it MEANS IT. I use it for my mango Dragonfruit drink so I don’t have to pay $5 a cup, and this stuff is WAY more effective than the coffee shop version of the drink. Absolutely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to add to my herbal mix drink and boosts energy. It makes me feel full too. I hate coffee but this thing has no taste of coffee at all.
customer_reviews.author: Russ crum

customer_reviews.title: Great benefits for gut and brain
customer_reviews.text: I take this not necessarily for the weight loss that some may take it for. Rather, I take it for the gut health benefits. Studies have shown that cholinergic acid modulates the gut positively and lowers inflammation (which is the reason you lose weight). And green coffee bean extract contains high amounts of it. Cholinergic acid also repairs the blood brain barrier as well, so that’s an additional benefit if you suffer from autoimmune disease or had brain trauma.
customer_reviews.author: Siasina

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight loss!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I do not put it in a liquid form so I can not attest to the taste. What I do is put it in capsules and have been using it for weight loss. It is working perfectly! I've had no adverse reactions to it and am seeing great results. I appreciate companies like this who have pure powder form so I can avoid all the nano particle fillers others put in theirs. With this company it is just pure green coffee bean. That's so nice. I will definitely be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Krysticgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product mixes well with coffee and tea
customer_reviews.text: Good Product! My only knock would be it taste very bitter. They don't really tell you what it would mix well with. I ended up adding this to my coffee and/or tea in the mornings. It didn't make me jittery but did give me a little extra boost. I'll definitely keep using this product.
customer_reviews.author: avery yeary

customer_reviews.title: great when blended into sweet drinks/smoothies/tea
customer_reviews.text: Quite strong green coffee powder with a bitter taste, great when blended into sweet drinks/smoothies/tea. It certainly feels stronger and more effective than your normal drip coffee. I would recommend drinking this in the morning for a complete wake-up.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoyue Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I put it in my morning smoothie for extra caffeine. A good energy booster and will last a whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Kar

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great addition to my morning coffee. I'm usually a two or three cup kinda girl every morning. When adding this coffee extract, one cup does the trick. Love it! Nice energy boost, not jittery at all. Serving size is so small that I do not even notice a change in the flavor of my coffee. Like that this product is natural and have asked everyone I know if they are aware that coffee beans are green?!? I'm not the only one who has always thought they're black...who knew?
customer_reviews.author: holly B

customer_reviews.title: green coffee not for me...
customer_reviews.text: i followed direction on how to make this from other line pages....i added 2tsps and put it in 2 cups hot water and let it sit 10 minutes.... i did feel stimulation as in h eadache , creativity and mood but eventual this left me feeling unpleasant/unstable enough... dont know whether Chlorogenic Acid and/or other present chemicals in it....
customer_reviews.author: evolving human

customer_reviews.title: Came in nice packaging. Gave me a nice boost
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on Dr. Oz and decided to give it a shot. Came in nice packaging. Gave me a nice boost. Tastes smooth, not bitter, and pairs great with cinnamon.
customer_reviews.author: orkin

customer_reviews.title: Smells like feet now
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product and it’s been lasting me awhile. Now I opened the bag and noticed it has a bad smell that I didn’t notice before, like feet, and I’m wondering if it’s safe to drink. I stored it at room temperature and I’m thinking now I probably should have kept it refrigerated. I’d hate to toss out a bag of good coffee but I’m also afraid to drink it in case it’s gone bad. I recommend the product but I recommend refrigerating it, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE WET DOG SH**
customer_reviews.text: Okay so admittedly I order this instead of coffee fruit powder on accident. And let me tell you. This stuff smells like a pile of dog sh*t. It is disgusting. I don’t think anybody would ever be able to put this on their mouth. I put a small 3/4 teaspoon in with my 32oz drink and I had to dump the whole thing out. I was nauseous for a whole hour after just smelling this stuff. Please heed my warning and do not buy this unless you like suffering or really want to ruin someone’s baked goods. Now I understand why they come in pill form.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic in smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my smoothies ever day. I have noticed a difference in my energy level and general well being. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Meller

customer_reviews.title: Weight management.  Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Not that hungry after taking it for 4 weeks and hope to lose some weight later.
customer_reviews.author: Charles bowman

customer_reviews.title: Buy for the goodness.
customer_reviews.text: Some ppl say you should take this for weight loss... Nope. It absolutely hasn't ever worked for me in that way but I don't buy it for that reason. This is the second time trying this stuff (different brand and different store). Buy it for all the other reasons that are absolutely legit: brain, mood and heart health, for starters! Plus, less caffeine than addictive stimulant coffee! Take this for the other health reasons and it won't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Eh, hasnt worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Might be me but just doesnt work well. Been using for 4 weeks now, 5 out of 7 days. Feel like im still getting headaches from not getting caffeine intake i am used to. Also doesnt really give me that jolt i need in the morning. Started with one scoop, then moved to 2 just to see if there would be a difference but not much.
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Working for me
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely feel the caffeine kick and I have had none of the digestive problems that sometimes occur with green coffee. Planning on purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not hungry anymore. It works.
customer_reviews.text: See the change for my weight after 3 weeks. Feel not that hungry now. Will continue taking and update again.
customer_reviews.author: Linzy

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I add it to my coffee every morning, and I firmly believe that it can help me lose weight. After 17 days of taking it, I lose 2 pounds and I will continue to buy it back
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Good product to reduce food craving.
customer_reviews.text: I added mine with my vitamin C solution every morning, it does help me to reduce the craving for food. I didn't have any effect in diarrhoea, I felt fullness for the whole day. Been taking for a month, I loved it. My weight also went down for about 2-3kg, with lighter and more meals, cause always felt full fast. Drink more water. Taking about 2 small spoon each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking the green coffee bean since last month and foubd noticeable difference in weight loss and feeling more active.

This tastes good and I always take 1 scoop twice a day.

customer_reviews.title: Little bitter taste but effective and easy to mix to flavor to liking

Feeling less hungry but energized to exercise. It's so easy to mix and use and well packaged, resealable. Read other reviews and agree to what I have read about this product. Highly recommend, noticed pounds are coming off, however, it's because I am less hungry and exercise, the product alone likely will not magically work without proper diet and working out.

customer_reviews.title: Coffee power no harsh taste
customer_reviews.text: I have made an effort to utilize more-natural products recently and this green coffee powder fulfils that requirement. I get energy without the drag of artificial products. The flavor profile is a bit strong but pleasant and once you find the right mixes for it you will probably not even notice it anymore. Great for an afternoon pick up or a morning starter.
customer_reviews.author: Jashawn

customer_reviews.title: A little misleading!
customer_reviews.text: I still like the product in that it seems to be a very high quality powder with a pure taste. But in the above click on the picture, in one it says other green coffee bean products have caffine and no chlorogenic acid, which highly untrue. That doesn't mean this product is not good, but that is false representation. I did lose 2 lbs. the first week and will continue on with the product. I just wanted buyers to be aware of the false statements.
customer_reviews.author: Janetta Vculek

customer_reviews.title: Effective Metabolism Boost!
customer_reviews.text: I've been adding this product to my smoothies for a bout a week now and have enjoyed stellar results. The taste is a bit bitter, but if you can get passed that by mixing in some other healthy ingredients to mask it, the metabolism boost is worth it. Overall, I've enjoyed the benefits this product provides and would recommend it to anyone looking to lose weight.

product_meta.title: Maximum Strength Pure Green Coffee Bean Extract, 4 Ounce, Super Green Coffee Bean Fat Burn Supplement, Supports Metabolism and Weight Management, No GMOs and Vegan Friendly
feature_bullets: Natural Green Coffee Bean Powder, 4 Ounce, Most Active Chlorogenic Acid, No GMOs and Vegan Friendly.
